channel.title: web on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in web on D00k

item.title: Extreme Web Optimizations, without Compromising Style
item.description: Over the past 10 months, I’ve worked on and off tweaking my site to get it closer to how I want it to look and perform. The main goal was simple: make a site that looks good, and loads fast. A quick solution would’ve been to keep the css to a minimum, use browser defaults for fonts etc. However that would’ve made my vision of a styled site difficult if not impossible.
